The weather is so nice that I hate you slightly less today.
How about doing something outside today, you lazy fuck?
Your balls wont freeze off or boil away today. Congrats.
QUICK! Take 200 pics to put on Instagram during winter. #tbt
FUCKING SHIT FU… No it\'s fine… False Alarm. It\'s ok outside.

string-array.name: Very_Hot_80x
string-array.item: Well those clouds didn't do shit for the heat.
You sure the phone won\'t melt?
I seriously hope you have AC… or a fridge.
I can\'t imagine how the bus will smell with this heat.
All aboard the Sweat Train!! Choo Choo Motherfuckers!
You smell like sweat…
Why is it so hard to fucking breath??
It\'s too hot to work. Stay at home you lazy fuck.
If you hadn\'t sinned so much, you wouldn\'t be in hell.
Why burn in hell when people can just go outside?
Have you ever felt sweat drip to your ass-crack? Stay outside and experience it.
You know this phone\'s circuits will melt at this weather, right?
Some things are too hot to touch today: The ground, the rocks, the air.
You better drink water to combat this fucked up heat

string-array.name: Kelvin_Quotes
string-array.item: Look who is trying to be fancy by using Kelvin.
OK seriously, no one uses Kelvin. Change it back.
What kind of a douchebag uses Kelvin for the Weather?
Stop being a cunt and turn the temperature back to the right way, or Fahrenheit.
You are not smart for using Kelvin.
Look at me. I use Kelvin. Oh la la… That\'s you.
You know how I know you are a Virgin, you use Kelvin.
OK joke\'s over. Don\'t use Kelvin.
You realize that Kelvin is an option as a joke.
You are using Kelvin. This is why no one likes you.
Guess who is a Dick who also uses Kelvin for the weather? It\'s rhetorical.
